name: 果汁大战
description:
Can you help Juice Baby make an exciting and fun adventure in the world of drinks?

An addictive puzzle game where you can happily lead the huge juice baby army! All the way through the increasingly difficult levels, through the resourceful strategy and strategy to defeat the enemy to destroy their fortress.

Use your intuition and your brain power to solve puzzles, get high scores, and try to get all three stars in stages!

Get a great gaming experience with a lot of puzzle adventures!


Game features:

- Addictive, casual games that people around the world love!
- Three kinds of juice babies are restrained from each other, and the optimized combination can improve combat effectiveness!
- Has a multi-level level and is constantly updated.
- Contains different game variations and styles, you must use your brainpower and skills to reach the next level!
- Numerous customs clearance combinations can blow up all obstacles.
- Stunning image effects with cute animations
- The rhythm and reward process of the game that makes people want to stop
- Juice Wars can be played offline! You don't need wireless network or data traffic to play this game!
- More languages are coming soon! Anyone can play Juice Wars!

Welcome to " Juice Wars ", this is a world of juice baby, you can have fun!
